alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 11:14PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Jackson and southeastern Franklin Counties through MIDNIGHT CST... At 1114 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Huntland, or 9 miles south of Winchester, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winchester, Cowan, Sewanee, Anderson, Jericho, St. Andrews and Sherwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for northeastern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
